title: qwer
summary_text: AI Summariser Sprint Planning Meeting Transcript ---------------------------------------------------- Date: November 9, 2025 Platform: Zoom Project: AI Meeting Summariser – Sprint 3 Review Participants: - Aisha (Team…
key_points: Backend summarization module is almost complete.
Integration and deadlines for the demo are critical.
QA needs test coverage for error handling.
Internal demo scheduled for November 10th at 9 PM.
Sprint 4 will focus on question-answer generation and cluster summaries.
Planning meeting on November 12th at 6 PM.
Progress review report due before the end of next week.
Review meeting on November 13th at 8:10 PM.
decisions: Demo will focus on frontend UI and summarization output.
SYSTEM_PROMPT will remain fixed until after the demo.
Regenerate summary button will be added for testing.
action_items: Nina to write regression cases by tomorrow.
Arul to finish calendar connection UI and fix 400 error tonight.
Sam to redeploy containerized build tomorrow afternoon.
Everyone to prepare ideas for embeddings by November 12th.
Shiva to prepare backend metrics for review meeting.
Arul to include frontend screenshots and workflow demo.
Nina to handle test coverage section.
Sam to generate performance stats from Docker logs.
Everyone to update tasks in Jira before the end of the day.
